title: Someone hacked my account and spent my RP
body: So, I started getting some strange messages yesterday after completing a game that said something to the effect of "Someone has logged into your account on another computer" then my client would close. So, after the second time, I changed my password and didn't have the problem again yesterday or today. I played a lot earlier today, then went to work. When I got home, I log back on to a message that says "(insert friend's Summoner name) has received their Officer Vi skin" and I look at my RP and it's down from 600 something to 128. I just changed my e-mail on my account, and I am about to change my password again. Is there any way to get my RP back or at least a way to prevent this from happening? I haven't given my password (or even my username for that matter) to anyone, I don't let people smurf on my account, and I don't share my account with anyone in any way.

replies.body:
I'd first ensure your account is secure using [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account), then reach out to our account specialists in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) We'll be able to work with you 1 on 1 there.

Let me know if you have any questions.
